data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Agile Escape
data.note: You cannot perform this action while rooted
data.description: You leap backwards from your target, causing your target to be Staggered for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Agonizing Wound
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A cruel attack to your target, which deals 177 damage. If you are behind your target, you ignore your target's armor.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Baneful Touch
data.description: Any time you attack an enemy from the sides or rear with an action, you will gain 15 Action Points.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Black Lotus Blade
data.note:
Builds 1 Blood Lust
Requires 9 points in Path of Suffering
data.description: A deadly strike which deals 202 damage to your target and infects them with Black Lotus toxin, causing all healing that they receive for the next 10 seconds to become 50% less effective.

data.name: Blade Spin
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Booby Trap
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You booby trap a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Broad Severing
data.description: Increases the range of Slice's arc to 30 feet and removes the target limitation.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Dance of Doom
data.description: You concentrate on your target, repeatedly dealing 300 damage to them for up to 3 seconds.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Death Reaper
data.description: Increases critical hit chance by 50% for 10 seconds for all group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Elixir of Blades
data.description:
A powerful witch's brew which hastens your reactions for the next 7 seconds. Any time an enemy strikes you, you will deal 100 damage back to them.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Elixir of Insane Power
data.description:
A vile brew which drives you into a rage for the next 7 seconds. All of your attacks will ignore 50% of the victim's armor.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Elixir of the Cauldron
data.description:
A potion filled from the legendary Cauldron Of Blood which fills you with power, increasing your chance to disrupt enemy magic by 100% for 7 seconds.
You may only use a single Elixir at a time.

data.name: Enchanting Beauty
data.description: Your unearthly Elven beauty Detaunts all enemies within 30 feet, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Enfeebling Strike
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You ambush your target from the shadows and strike with a Crippling attack. Your target will take 75 Corporeal damage every time they move for 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Enveloping Shadows
data.description: When leaving Shadow Prowler, you will become protected by a barrier that will absorb up to 475 damage

data.name: Envenomed Blade
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: You stab your enemy with a poisoned blade, dealing 110 damage. The victim becomes wracked with pains, suffering an additional 432 damage over 9 seconds. This effect will stack with itself up to three times.

data.name: Exotic Venom
data.description: Increases the durations of Vehement Blades, Enfeebling Strike, and Treacherous Assault by an additional 5 seconds.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feinted Positioning
data.description: Your positional attacks can be used without the positional requirement for 10 seconds. Does not affect morale abilities.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fleet-Footed
data.description: Your swift footwork and quick thinking removes all roots and snares from you. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Fling Poison
data.description: Deals 1600 damage over 5 seconds to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: For the Hag Queen!
data.description: Your Frenzies will now have a 10% chance per point spent to knock the enemy down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Frenzied Mayhem
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 3% for each Blood Lust point you have.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Heart Render Toxin
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You quickly strike your target two times, dealing damage and inflicting an Ailment on them for 10 seconds which reduces their Wounds.
1 Blood Lust: 88 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 25.
2 Blood Lust: 109 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 33.
3 Blood Lust: 131 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 41.
4 Blood Lust: 151 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 50.
5 Blood Lust: 172 damage per hit; Wounds reduced by 58.

data.name: Heart Seeker
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Builds 1 Blood Lust
Requires 9 points in Path of Treachery
data.description: A shocking strike which deals 277 damage and knocksdown your target for 3 seconds.

data.name: Increased Pain
data.description: Your critical hits will inflict 50% more damage.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Kiss of Agony
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to have their Initiative reduced by 50 for the next 10 seconds. You capitalize on their momentary weakness, causing your Initiative to be increased for the same amount during this time.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

data.name: Kiss of Betrayal
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing them to lose 20 Action Points. Seeing your enemy suffer causes you to gain as many Action Points as they have lost.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

data.name: Kiss of Death
data.description:
You cover your blades with a toxic concoction. Anytime you damage an enemy there is a 25% chance that your target will take an extra 100 Corporeal damage. The concoction seeps into your enemy, causing all healing done by them to be reduced to 50% for the next 5 seconds.
You may only have one Kiss active at a time.

data.name: Kiss of Doom
data.description: Kiss of Death will now heal you for the damage it deals.

data.name: Masterful Treachery
data.description: After hitting an enemy with Treacherous Assault, Vehement Blades, or Enfeebling Strike, you will deal 15% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: On Your Knees!
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Carnage
data.description:
You spin around and strike your target with a pair of quick, punishing attacks that knocks them down for 3 seconds, and does damage to your target an all enemies around them.
1 Blood Lust: 92 damage per hit, 30 feet radius.
2 Blood Lust: 117 damage per hit, 35 feet radius.
3 Blood Lust: 143 damage per hit, 40 feet radius.
4 Blood Lust: 167 damage per hit, 43.3 feet radius.
5 Blood Lust: 192 damage per hit, 48.3 feet radius.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Overwhelming Dread
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet instantly lose 125 Action Points, and will regain action points 50% more slowly for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Pick Lock
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Pierce Armor
data.note:
Builds 1 Blood Lust
Requires 9 points in Path of Carnage
data.description: A powerful stab that slices through the target's defenses, dealing 227 damage to your target and ignoring all of their armor. If the target suffers from an Ailment, then your Weapon Skill will be increased by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Puncture
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
You quickly stab your target twice, dealing damage based on your Blood Lust.
1 Blood Lust: 113 damage per hit
2 Blood Lust: 143 damage per hit
3 Blood Lust: 173 damage per hit
4 Blood Lust: 201 damage per hit
5 Blood Lust: 230 damage per hit

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 239 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Ruthless Assault
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
data.description:
A relentless string of attacks which repeatedly strikes your target and all enemies within 20 feet of them up to 6 times over 3 seconds.
1 Blood Lust: 402 damage.
2 Blood Lust: 504 damage.
3 Blood Lust: 606 damage.
4 Blood Lust: 702 damage.
5 Blood Lust: 804 damage.

data.name: Sacrifices Rewarded
data.description:
Any time you are critically hit by a direct damage ability, you will become protected by a barrier which will absorb up to 600 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Sacrificial Stab
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Treachery
data.description:
You offer up your target as a sacrifice, stabbing them twice and healing yourself for all damage that you dealt. Your auto attack speed will be increased by 10%, and your enemy will be snared based by 3%, per resource point spent.
1 Blood Lust: 88 damage per hit.
2 Blood Lust: 109 damage per hit.
3 Blood Lust: 131 damage per hit.
4 Blood Lust: 151 damage per hit.
5 Blood Lust: 172 damage per hit.

data.name: Septic Blade
data.description: Envenomed Blade will now also reduce the victim's chance to critically hit by 10% per stack.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.note: Target must have a Blessing
data.description: You sever one Blessing from your enemy and do 127 damage

data.name: Sever Limb
data.note: Requires Parry
data.description: A precise Crippling attack that deals 227 damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shadow Prowler
data.description:
You prowl through the shadows for the next 30 seconds, rendering you invisible to your foes unless you or they draw too close. You are less likely to be noticed when stationary, flanking your target or if you have high Initiative.
The cooldown of this abillity is reduced by 1 second for every enemy within 100 feet of you when the effect is broken.
This effect will slwoly drain your action points and will end if you use any abilities or run out of action points.

data.name: Sharpened Edge
data.description:
Anytime an attack you make is blocked or parried, you will automatically do 150 damage to your target.
Cannot occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Slice
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A wide slice which deals 236 damage to up to 3 enemies in front of you, up to 15 feet away.

data.name: Swift Blades
data.description:
Increases your chance to parry attacks by 10%. Each time you parry an attack, you will regain 20 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Swift Movements
data.description: Reduces Feinted Positioning's cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Swift Pursuit
data.description: Fleet-Footed will now also increase your run speed by 25%.

data.name: Taste of Blood
data.description: Any time you take damage, there is a 25% chance that you will cause 15% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Slitter
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A swift slice that silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 3 seconds. You will also deal 202 damage to your target if you attack them from behind.

data.name: Throwing Dagger
data.description:
A quick dagger throw which deals 97 damage.
Your attack will snare the enemy if used behind your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Treacherous Assault
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You leap out at your target in a maddened battle craze, immediately gaining 2 Blood Lust. Your target will take 175 Corporeal damage every time they use a magical ability for 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Vehement Blades
data.note: Requires Prowling
data.description: You leap out of the shadows in an insane rage. Each time your target uses a melee ability, your target will take 125 Corporeal damage for each melee ability used over the next 15 seconds. Your abilities will cost 50% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. Builds 2 Blood Lust.

data.name: Web of Shadows
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Whirling Blades
data.description: Your attacks which build Blood Lust will now have a 33% chance to build one additional Blood Lust.

data.name: Witchbrew
data.note:
Frenzy - Requires Blood Lust
Costs 20% fewer action points per Blood Lust spent
Requires 13 points in Path of Suffering
data.description:
You consume a noxious liquid distilled from blood which fills you with power, causing your next several attacks to each deal an additional 300 Corporeal damage to your target.
1 Blood Lust: Lasts for 2 attacks.
2 Blood Lust: Lasts for 3 attacks.
3 Blood Lust: Lasts for 4 attacks.
4 Blood Lust: Lasts for 5 attacks.
5 Blood Lust: Lasts for 6 attacks.

data.name: Wracking Pains
data.note: Builds 1 Blood Lust
data.description: A brutal attack that deals 728 Spirit damage to your target over 21 seconds. If the target is Ailing, then their Toughness and Weapon Skill will also be reduced by 75 for 21 seconds.

data.name: Shadow Runner
data.description:
You blend with the shadows and surge forward. You are rendered invisible to your foes and your movement speed is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.
The cooldown of this abillity is reduced by 1 second for every enemy within 100 feet of you when the effect is broken.
This effect will end if you use any abilities.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will recieve 25% less damage from ranged or magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.
